amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-110 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 4, 12, 13, 21, 24, 29, and 34.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 4, 12, 13, 21, 24, 29, and 34 printed in Part D of House Report 117-110.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendments (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 202 - 217 (Roll no. 240).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
